      • createPath

        public void createPath(int trip_no,
              java.lang.String type,
              java.lang.String path,
              double time)
        This function is used to store the newly created media's information in the database
        Parameters:
        trip_no - : trip number of the media
        type - : photo/video/audio
        path - : Storage location of the media
        time - : instance of time at which media is captured
